## utils.style.isRightToLeft() function

Returns true if the element is using right to left (RTL) direction. Copied from Closure's goog.style.isRightToLeft

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isRightToLeft(el: Element): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  el | Element | The element to test.  True for right to left, false for left to right.  Blockly.utils.style.isRightToLeft |
